metadata.description: Program Management - Program-level controls, governance - MAPPED

controls.Name: PM-1-description - Information Security Program Plan

details: Develop and disseminate organization-wide information security program plan
Include roles, responsibilities, and management commitment
Review and update program plan regularly

controls.notes: AWS functions support information security program plan through program management, governance, and compliance monitoring capabilities

details: Develop and disseminate organization-wide information security program plan

Review and update program plan regularly

Ensure activities continue to be executed
Review plans for consistency with risk strategy

details: Establish contact with security and privacy groups
Maintain currency with practices and technologies

controls.Name: PM-21-description - Accounting of Disclosures

details: Develop and maintain accounting of disclosures
Record date, nature, and purpose of disclosures
Retain accounting records for required time period
Make accounting available to individuals upon request

controls.notes: AWS functions support accounting of disclosures through program management, governance, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: PM-22-description - Personally Identifiable Information Quality Management

details: Develop policies for PII quality management
Review accuracy, relevance, timeliness, and completeness
Correct or delete inaccurate or outdated PII
Disseminate notice of corrections or deletions
Establish appeals process for adverse decisions

controls.notes: AWS functions support personally identifiable information quality management through program management, governance, and compliance monitoring capabilities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of program management compliance and controls
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program management monitoring for PM-1 and PM-4 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of program governance and leadership roles
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program governance monitoring for PM-2 and PM-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Comprehensive logging of program management activities
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program activity logging for PM controls compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated program access control and authorization management
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program access control for PM-10 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated management of program management systems and controls
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program management automation for PM controls compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated detection of program-related threats and incidents
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced program threat detection for PM controls compliance
